TopicTitle: Space Shuttle Launch video, from onboard the Booster!

Articles.Content: Fantastic video, not sure if it has been posted before but if you have not seen this it is pretty awe inspiring!

Wow, That is truely awesome! Thank you for sharing

I haven't seen it before; I have, though, seen (some of) the video from the onboard cameras of the last space shuttle launch.

Very cool. It makes some eerie sounds after separation.

Also I did not know they jettison the nozzle just before splashdown.
I've seen that video so many times already and it never gets old. Absolutely amazing!
